Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Joycelyn Henry-Hampson
Reviews.Content: Very good table/ phone.I would recommend it over some other cheap tablets that I have previously bought.. However, no choice in colours is a disadvantage.

Reviews.Title: no internet
Reviews.Author: Jamal J.
Reviews.Content: Nice tablet but can't get Internet connection.used same sim with other unlocked phone tablet got internet.so I guess I got a faulty one.

Reviews.Title: PINK PHONE TABLET
Reviews.Author: zaakira gallman
Reviews.Content: well, I am an 18 year old college student. i chose this product because it was in my budget and love the color pink, lol.Pros: powder pink, large screen, screenshots(without an app)Cons: it's programmed as a tablet so i wasn't able to use it on Metro PCS, bad quality cameras (expected for the price), Instagram wasn't available in the play store for it, however i was able to download it from a site found on Google.Even though it will not work with metro pcs I'm willing to give it a shot with another carrier but using it as a tablet has been great!

Reviews.Title: its good
Reviews.Author: lui
Reviews.Content: Its good. its fast phone calling is good. Camera is good. I want more of it but it is out of stock

Reviews.Title: great tablets.love the colour.
Reviews.Author: Honico Hall "f.g"
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful tablets with lots of features.I had order it before but did not received it.Really love the colour because it is unsual.

wifi+GSM phone+Quad Band Battery Life: 3 -4 hours
Dual camera :Front 0.3 MP, Rear 2MP
